original_title: New study finds 12-3-30 treadmill workout burns more fat than running | Fox News
article_summary: Study finds 12-3-30 treadmill workout burns more fat compared to running, but runs burn calories faster. For quick calorie burn, running is more efficient, but for fat burning and lower impact, 12-3-30 may be beneficial, especially for beginners or those with joint concerns. Consistency is key in exercise.</s>
